text: Hoots Milling Company Roller Mill, also known as Charles A. Bunn Company Office and Warehouse, is a historic roller mill and warehouse located at Winston-Salem, Forsyth County, North Carolina. The mill was built about 1935, and is a two-story heavy timber and frame building, with an attached two-story heavy timber and frame warehouse built about 1937. A one-story, metal-sided, front-gable-roofed, warehouse was built in the 1930s. A one-story warehouse added in the 1950s connected the two buildings. The mill incorporates a gabled grain elevator. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2014. ==References== Category:Grinding mills in North Carolina Category:Grinding mills on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Industrial buildings completed in 1937 Category:Buildings and structures in Winston-Salem, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Winston-Salem, North Carolina
title: Hoots Milling Company Roller Mill
